caption.p: Native (left) and non-native (right) vegetation cover (%) in open and fenced plots ( N = 10 one-m 2 quadrats per plot) at sites with low ( A and C) and high ( B and D) earthworm density at West Point, NY from 2009 to 2012. Data represent means ± 1SE ( N = 4 and 8 sites with low and high earthworm density, respectively).
